text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a SPRT

name: ActRelationshipHasSupport
title: ActRelationshipHasSupport
description: Used to indicate that an existing service is suggesting evidence for a new observation. The assumption of support is attributed to the same actor who asserts the observation. Source must be an observation, target may be any service (e.g., to indicate a status post.)
